title: We’ve Been Waiting, AZALEA!
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>I can’t wait for it to start~. Yesterday’s live was the best, but I’m looking forward to today’s AZALEA’s live as well!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hey, Emmacchi. I heard that you guys did something to surprise all three AZALEA members?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Surprise....? I wonder if we did something like that?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Dia, Kanan, and Hanamaru said that they were all embarrassed that Nijigaku members knew things that they were trying to keep a secret~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eh, oh no, those were supposed to be a secret....? I-, I didn’t realize that.... What do I do, I have to apologize to them.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>No, no~! You don’t need to do that. Because since they got surprised, they’re determined to surprise us e~ven more♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m glad then~. Aqours performance is amazing, but your unit performance is also great!! I love both!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yes~! Me too~! Will they surprise us again today? Mari can’t wait~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah, It’ll be fun! Let’s make a lot of noise, Mari-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Mari won’t lose to you, Emmacchi! Mari will have you know that my cheering is out of this world~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
